title: Brave Irene
creator_credit: Daniel Ivanick, Paul R. Gagne and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: Irene’s mother is a seamstress who has been chosen to make a dress for the Duchess to wear to the big ball. When her mother gets sick, Irene decides to take the dress to the duchess herself. On the way there it begins to snow, but Irene is determined to reach the palace before the ball. Narrated by Lindsay Crouse. Based on the book by William Steig.
